metadata.title: CVE-2019-20051 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A floating-point exception was discovered in PackLinuxElf::elf_hash in p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95. The vulnerability causes an application crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
